title: Waze disabled voice commands on Android Auto - 9to5Google
description: Waze has unexpectedly disabled almost all voice commands on Android Auto, and it was an intentional change too.
content:

title: Gmail is putting ads in the middle of users’ inboxes - The Verge
description: Gmail has started to place ads in the middle of users’ inboxes. While Google has long placed ads at the very top of inboxes, this seemingly new placement will make it even harder to distinguish between ads and actual emails.
